properties.name: Crepevine
properties.description: Posted by Paiges 5600 College Avenue Oakland CaHours: Sun to Thurs 7:30 am to 11 pm Frid & Sat 7:30 am to 12 midnight Middle Eastern, Crepes. Vegetarian dishes. Not pure vegetarian. Menu: Crepes with an option of fillings such as grilled eggplants, cheddar cheese, spinach, peppers, pine nuts and peanut sauce. Other Info: Cafeteria-style, take-out. Place order at counter and food is brought to you. No credit card; cash only.

properties.name: Doyle Street Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Jax2006    5515 Doyle St, Emeryville CANext door to my workplace, this is the best place for a quick lunch without having to spend any time in transit. I like the people who work there and the friendly atmosphere. Two brothers run the place and they are very friendly. The Reuben is good, the turkey sandwich is my default quick meal, and BBQ Quesadillas, which are a special, are also very good. Too bad I never feel like I can go there and completely relax.

properties.name: La Calaca Loca
properties.description: Posted by Antonjazz 5199 Telegraph Ave., oakland caGreat, healthy mexican food. They use quality meats (Niman Ranch, etc.) and often organic produce. Delicious.

properties.name: Lanesplitter Pub
properties.description: Posted by Paiges  2033 San Pablo Ave, Berkeley, CA510 845 1652

properties.name: Le Cheval
properties.description: Posted by Antonjazz 1007 Clay St, Oakland, CALarge Vietnamese restaurant, extensive menu, very popular. Delicious food, quick service. Free parking after 5pm in a lot at 11th & Jefferson.

properties.name: Manzanita Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Antonjazz 1050 40th St, Emeryville, CAVegan restaurant. The new, spruced-up incarnation of the Organic Cafe, an East Bay institution for decades.

properties.name: Miyozen Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Antonjazz 1147 40th St., emeryville caDelicious japanese restaurant. Chic decor, reasonable prices.

properties.name: Restaurante Dona Tomas
properties.description: Posted by Antonjazz Exquisite mexican food and atmosphere. Not a taqueria but a real restaurant.

properties.name: Rudy's Can't Fail Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Antonjazz emeryville, caFunky diner. Clean. Huge collection of Barbie dolls. Open until 1pm. Service can be a bit slow.

properties.name: Subway
properties.description: Posted by Antonjazz san pablo ave and 40th street, oakland caSandwiches. Inexpensive. Lousy atmosphere, of course.
